description: Default CAIGA tip bank - bundled fallback when no online dataset is available

low_health.text: Your health is low—eat food or find shelter.
Avoid combat until you heal up.
Golden apples provide extra healing and absorption.

low_food.text: You're hungry—hunt animals or harvest crops for food.
Cooked food restores more hunger than raw.
Bread is quick to make with just wheat.
Steak and cooked pork are among the best foods.

night_risk.text: Night is dangerous—seek shelter or place torches.
Hostile mobs spawn in darkness. Light up your area.
A bed lets you skip the night entirely.

mining_mode.text: Mining deep? Watch for lava and keep torches handy.
Always mine with a buddy system or mark your path.
Iron armor and a shield improve survival underground.
Diamonds are most common below Y=16.

near_resource.text: Resource under your crosshair—consider mining it.
Use the right tool for faster mining and durability.
Some ores require a stone pickaxe or better.

exploring.text: Exploring? Note your base coordinates to avoid getting lost.
Place torches on one side to find your way back.
Keep spare food and tools when venturing far.
Villages can provide useful loot and trading.
